sentence.Network_en: I distrust the incommunicable; it is the source of all violence.
sentence.Network_cn: 我不相信那些不能与人交流的人, 这便是一切暴力的源头.

sentence.Network_en: The attributes of God. What is God ( Shorter Catechism ). Incommunicable attributes. Communicable attributes.
sentence.Network_cn: 上帝的属性. [上帝是什么?] ( 小要理问答 ). 不可传递的属性, 可传递的属性.

PerfectNetExp.abs: adj 传染的,有感染力的=communicable【参】contiguous(邻近的)【反】incommunicable(不能传达的)" ostensiblyadv. 表面上; 明显地 expotential nature of social.

list.abs: incommodity 不便利incommunicability 不能传达incommunicable 不能传达的

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense 'incommunicative'): from late Latin incommunicabilis 'not to be imparted', from in- 'not' + communicabilis (see communicable)
